title.narrative: SOCIAL POLICY

description.narrative: Increased social inclusion of all cchildren, supported through systems, evidence, policies and resources, which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Economic And Social Policy General, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Public Finance And Local Governance, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: WCAR country programmes contribute to achieving the Strategic Plan 2014-2017 key results for children through application of country appropriate strategies - in development and humanitarian contexts

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
